snippet: Prime Minister Mario Monti has pledged to introduce measures to revive Italy’s economy, but is also raising pressure on Europe to shore up the single currency.
abstract: Italy's Prime Minister Mario Monti has pledged to introduce measures to revive nation's economy, but is also raising pressure on Europe to shore up the single currency; Italy faces the twin, and in some ways conflicting, imperatives of lifting growth while reducing its public debt.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Mario Monti has pledged to introduce measures to revive Italy’s economy, but is also raising pressure on Europe to shore up the single currency.

headline.seo: In Italy, Mario Monti Shifts Recovery Focus to Growth
headline.main: Italy’s Prime Minister Shifts Recovery Focus to Economic Growth
headline.print_headline: Italy’s Prime Minister Shifts Recovery Focus to Economic Growth
